ch.zhaw.paraglider.physics

Class Pilot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.paraglider.physics.Pilot

  • public final class Pilot
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class handles the physics and the position of the pilot. In addition it includes a method which animates the pilot.
    Author:
    Christian Brüesch

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCurrentXPosition()
      Returns the current position of the pilot on the x-axis.
      double getCurrentYPosition()
      Returns the current position of the pilot on the y-axis.
      static Pilot getInstance()
      Methode returns the instance of the Pilot.
      int getWeightOfPilot()
      Returns the weight of the pilot.
      boolean isInMovement()
      Returns a boolean which tells if the pilot is in movement.
      void makeNextStep()
      Calculates the next step of the animation of the pilot and sets the current position of the x and y - axis to the calculated values.
      void setInMovement(boolean inMovement)
      Sets the variable inMovment.
      void setNewSpeedChangeParameters(double speed, double verticalSpeed)
      Sets the new speed change.
      void setWeightOfPilot(int weight)
      Sets the new weight of the pilot.

        public static Pilot getInstance()
